sources.title: Turbo Kid | Full Movie | Action Adventure Sci-Fi | Michael Ironside
sources.description:
Turbo Kid - Set in the Wasteland of a post apocalyptic parallel future of 1997, an orphaned teenager named The Kid is scavenging for relics when he befriends a mysterious girl.
2015.  Stars: Munro Chambers, Laurence Leboeuf, Michael Ironside

metadata.Plot: In a post-apocalyptic future, THE KID, a young solitary scavenger obsessed with comic books must face his fears and become a reluctant hero when he meets a mysterious girl named APPLE. Despite their efforts to keep to themselves, ZEUS, the sadistic and self-proclaimed leader of the Wasteland, plagues THE KID and APPLE. Armed with little more than blind faith and an ancient turbocharged weapon, THE KID learns of justice and friendship and embarks on an incredible journey to rid the Wasteland of evil and save the girl of his dreams.
metadata.Director: François Simard, Anouk Whissell, Yoann-Karl Whissell
metadata.Writer: Anouk Whissell, François Simard, Yoann-Karl Whissell
metadata.Actors: Munro Chambers, Laurence Leboeuf, Michael Ironside
